ygData.msgSnippet: ... Killfest looks over at DrillBit, frowning. Hmm. I wouldn t say that s wise. Last time Hell Beast s group made an offensive, they attacked the Maximals.

::Killfest::

Killfest looks over at DrillBit, frowning.

"Hmm. I wouldn't say that's wise. Last time Hell Beast's group made an
offensive, they attacked the Maximals. Both us and the Alliance
'aided' the Maximals against Hell Beast. The Maximals are probably mad
at him, and letting them be mad at him could give us a big advantage,
keeping them off our backs and on Hell Beast's. Plus, if the Alliance
is aiding the Maximals, and we're supposedly on good terms with them,
we might as well keep low in case they aid the Maximals again."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Ok. I'll ask DarkFate and Kill about the attack now."
> He walks back into the room.
> "Dark, Kill, you guys want to attack the CF?"
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He sent the location.(I dont really care where) 
> "I'll meet you there asap."
> He ran out of the CF, transformed, and drove towards the location.
